metadata.name: Pink & Slow
metadata.description:
Welcome to the next phase of my relationship with Water Art Sculptures. The recording in slow motion of the actual drops, the collisions, then overlaying with beautiful music created for the specific NFT.

Making slow-motion video recordings is a complex and demanding process that requires specialized equipment and technical expertise.  
Capturing a high number of frames per second, requires a high bandwidth for processing, storage, and display all of which I sourced to create these NFT's. It was a crazy journey, one which I am totally obsessed with.

I hope you love this NFT as much as I loved producing it.  
Please give huge amount of Flowers to Dirk Remmington who collaborated with me to create the music.
